sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
        <v-app-bar>
            <v-app-bar-nav-icon class="d-sm-none" @click.stop="drawer = !drawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>

            <v-toolbar-title>My Store</v-toolbar-title>

            <v-spacer></v-spacer>

            <!-- Only show on medium and larger screens -->
            <router-link to="/home">
                <v-btn text class="d-none d-md-inline-flex">Home</v-btn>
            </router-link>
            <router-link to="/shop">
                <v-btn text class="d-none d-md-inline-flex">Shop</v-btn>
            </router-link>
            <router-link to="/blog">
                <v-btn text class="d-none d-md-inline-flex">Blog</v-btn>
            </router-link>
            <router-link to="/cart">
                <v-btn text class="d-none d-md-inline-flex">Cart</v-btn>
            </router-link>

            <!-- Menu icon for smaller screens -->
            <v-btn icon="mdi-dots-vertical" class="d-md-none" @click.stop="drawer = !drawer"></v-btn>

            <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer" :location="$vuetify.display.mobile ? 'bottom' : undefined" temporary>
                <v-list>
                    <v-list-item v-for="item in Navitems" :key="item.value" :to="{ path: '/' + item.value }" router>
                        <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
                    </v-list-item>
                </v-list>
            </v-navigation-drawer>
        </v-app-bar>
        <v-row class="pt-6">
            <v-col v-for="product in products" :key="product.id" cols="12" sm="6" md="4">
                <v-card data-aos="zoom-in-down">

                    <v-img :src="product.image" height="400px" width="100%"></v-img>


                    <v-card-text>
                        <v-row no-gutters align="center">
                            <v-col cols="auto">
                                {{ product.name }}
                            </v-col>
                            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                            <v-col cols="auto" class="text-right">
                                <v-btn color="primary" outlined @click="addToCart(product)">
                                    In Stock
                                </v-btn>
                            </v-col>
                        </v-row>
                    </v-card-text>
                    <v-row>
                        <v-card-title>${{ product.price }}</v-card-title>
                        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                        <v-rating hover :length="5" :size="32" :model-value="3" active-color="primary" class="pt='4'"/>
                    </v-row>
                    <!-- <v-card-subtitle>{{ product.category }}</v-card-subtitle> -->

                </v-card>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>
<script>
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
    data() {
        return {
            products: [],
        }
    },
    created() {
        this.fetchProducts();
    },
    methods: {
        async fetchProducts() {
            try {
                const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:3000/products');
                this.products = response.data;
            } catch (e) {
                console.error(e);
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>
